page.title: 12THE MANOR, MARSTON TRUSSELL
page.content: Mrs Smith has lived in Marston Trussell for 7 years.She uses her only means of transport,a car,to visit the shops daily.These are in the nearest towns of Market Harborough,Northampton and Rugby.Her family have grown up and left.She doesn't go out to work.The village hasn't changed since she lived there but more people own their own houses. Her house{The Manor}is{400 years old. She has a bedroom haunted by three } ghosts: a lady in black,a lady in white and a{Cavalier}who was killed in the bedroom and his blood splattered over the room.It is believed that the blood keeps disappearing and returning.These ghosts have been seen by Mrs Smith's daughter.Another local, Mark Brewster,lived in The Hall. He was a pirate who was finally beheaded in Moscow.
